Question: After a recount this person prevailed by 980 votes, or a 51% to 49% result—all but assuring him of election in November.
Hints: This person was the southern regional director for Nelson Rockefeller in 1968.
On Super Tuesday **** won his home state, Georgia, which has the most delegates, in "an otherwise dismal night for him".
This person's daughter Kathy Lubbers described the marriage as "difficult".
